descriptions.gpt-3.5-turbo: Fast and efficient model for most everyday tasks and conversations
descriptions.gpt-4: Advanced model with strong reasoning and knowledge capabilities
descriptions.claude-3-opus: Anthropic's most capable model with exceptional reasoning abilities
descriptions.claude-3-sonnet: Balanced performance and value for enterprise and everyday tasks
descriptions.gemini-1.5-flash: Google's versatile model optimized for text and code tasks
descriptions.local-vllm: Advanced model with strong reasoning and knowledge capabilities

descriptions.keep: Keep the original style of the text.
descriptions.concise: Provide shorter and more direct responses. Be brief and to the point.
descriptions.formal: Provide clear, professional and polished responses using formal language.
descriptions.explanatory: Provide educational responses that explain concepts clearly, as if teaching a student.
descriptions.creative: Provide imaginative and artistic responses, using metaphors and analogies.
descriptions.persuasive: Provide convincing and compelling responses, using rhetorical techniques.
descriptions.humorous: Provide light-hearted and funny responses, using jokes and puns.
descriptions.empathetic: Provide compassionate and understanding responses, showing empathy and support.
descriptions.friendly: Provide warm and approachable responses, using a friendly tone.
descriptions.technical: Provide detailed and precise responses, using technical language.
descriptions.casual: Provide relaxed and informal responses, using everyday language.
descriptions.detailed: Provide thorough and comprehensive responses, covering all aspects of the topic.
descriptions.analytical: Provide logical and critical responses, analyzing the topic in depth.
descriptions.assertive: Provide confident and strong responses, taking a clear stance.
